timeline.bodyHTML:
If we do

Suggested change
assertEquals(result.getErrorCount(), 5);
validateError(result, 0, "undefined function 'max'", 3, 12);
validateError(result, 1, "undefined function 'min'", 7, 12);
validateError(result, 2, "undefined function 'concat'", 8, 12);
validateError(result, 3, "unknown type 'Listener'", 12, 6);
validateError(result, 4, "unknown type 'CallStackElement'", 35, 30);
int index = 0;
validateError(result, index++, "undefined function 'max'", 3, 12);
validateError(result, index++, "undefined function 'min'", 7, 12);
validateError(result, index++, "undefined function 'concat'", 8, 12);
validateError(result, index++, "unknown type 'Listener'", 12, 6);
validateError(result, index++, "unknown type 'CallStackElement'", 35, 30);
assertEquals(result.getErrorCount(), index);

instead, we also assert that the actual error count matches the expected and that we've asserted all of the errors.
timeline.author: MaryamZi

timeline.bodyHTML:
Shall we refactor this into something like

            if ((entry.symbol.tag & SymTag.IMPORT) == SymTag.IMPORT) {
                Name importCompUnit = ((BPackageSymbol) entry.symbol).compUnit;
                if (importCompUnit == null) {
                    return entry.symbol;
                } else if (importCompUnit.equals(compUnit)) {
                    ((BPackageSymbol) entry.symbol).isUsed = true;
                    return entry.symbol;
                }
            }
timeline.author: MaryamZi

replies.bodyText: Let's also add a comment to say why the compUnit can be null here?
replies.author: MaryamZi

timeline.bodyHTML:
What I meant was something like

Map<Name, BPackageSymbol> modules = new HashMap<>();
modules.put(Names.ERROR, this.langErrorModuleSymbol);
modules.put(Names.OBJECT, this.langObjectModuleSymbol);
modules.put(Names.XML, this.langXmlModuleSymbol);

this.predeclaredModules = Collections.unmodifiableMap(modules);
timeline.author: pubudu91
